body:
In the repository, change `<package-name>/package.py` to `<package-name>/<package-name>.py`

Why?  Because the current scheme, where everything is called "package.py" doesn't work with standard tools.  For example:
 ^x^b in Emacs shows a sea of package.py.  You can't change from one to the other easily with ^xb
 You can't search for package.py (in a meaningful way) in SpartGit.

I'm sure the list goes on...
title: Put package name in package.py
